    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] hash(HashAlgorithm algorithm, byte[] bytes)
      Generates a hash value, in the form of an array of bytes, by digesting a provided bytes based on the provided hash algorithm.

      Generates a hash value, in the form of an array of bytes, by digesting a provided input stream based on the provided hash algorithm.
      static byte[] processDigest(HashAlgorithm algorithm, byte[] mdbytes)
      Processes the provided hash value, truncating the value based on the width of the provided hash algorithm.

      • hash

        public static byte[] hash(HashAlgorithm algorithm,
                          File file)
                   throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                          IOException
        Generates a hash value, in the form of an array of bytes, by digesting a provided input stream based on the provided hash algorithm.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the hash function to use
        file - the file to read bytes from
        Returns:
        an array of bytes representing a hash value
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the selected hash function is not supported
        IOException - if an error occured while reading the input stream

      • hash

        public static byte[] hash(HashAlgorithm algorithm,
                          InputStream is)
                   throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                          IOException
        Generates a hash value, in the form of an array of bytes, by digesting a provided input stream based on the provided hash algorithm.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the hash function to use
        is - the input stream to read bytes from
        Returns:
        an array of bytes representing a hash value
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the selected hash function is not supported
        IOException - if an error occured while reading the input stream

      • hash

        public static byte[] hash(HashAlgorithm algorithm,
                          byte[] bytes)
                   throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Generates a hash value, in the form of an array of bytes, by digesting a provided bytes based on the provided hash algorithm.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the hash function to use
        bytes - the bytes to digest
        Returns:
        an array of bytes representing a hash value
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the selected hash function is not supported

      • processDigest

        public static byte[] processDigest(HashAlgorithm algorithm,
                                   byte[] mdbytes)
        Processes the provided hash value, truncating the value based on the width of the provided hash algorithm.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the hash function to use
        mdbytes - the digest bytes to truncate
        Returns:
        an array of bytes representing a hash value based on the width of the provided hash algorithm
